description: The initiative focuses on transforming a family-owned cocoa farm into a sustainable business that prioritizes environmental responsibility and community engagement. By cultivating cocoa and creating high-quality chocolate products, the farm aims to educate consumers about the benefits of cocoa while promoting sustainable agricultural practices. The initiative also emphasizes the importance of direct consumer relationships, ensuring that the economic benefits of cocoa production support the local community and contribute to the farm's long-term viability.
name: Cinco Cacao
